turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu zor kararı almasan kimse seni yargılamazdı.
english_example_sentence: If you were not to take this difficult decision, no one would judge you.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не принял это трудное решение, никто бы тебя не осудил.
